MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of Dysart, affecting properties in Terrace Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.20am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to an underground cable fault and are awaiting a digging team to arrive on site, our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.21am on Friday 23rd October 2020.
